resources.string: Ducks are small, feathered birds that like to live on the surface of ponds and lakes. They enjoy swimming and eating bread, however it is better to feed them seed as bread can be bad for their health. There are many varieties of ducks but the most common is the Mallard.

Geese are scary creatures that tend to chase you with little to no provocation but are generally quite popular in France as guards for dangerous or important areas. Always approach with caution as these feathered beasts are temperamental but will generally try and look cute.
